description:
With his imposing physique and appropriate behavior, he is a charismatic student body president who attracts the support of the students. He and Chisaki, the vice president, are lovers and are known as the most famous passionate couple in the school, and they are often met with lukewarm reception from the other board members as they begin to create their own world together without regard to the duties of the student council.
Source: Official page
name: Kenzaki Touya
